thread.title: PSL final will be held in Lahore, confirms CM Punjab – ARYNEWS
thread.title_full: PSL final will be held in Lahore, confirms CM Punjab – ARYNEWS

author: Anees Hanif
title: PSL final will be held in Lahore, confirms CM Punjab – ARYNEWS
text:
Here is the news of the day, PSL2017 final will... by arynews 
LAHORE: Pakistan Super League (PSL) final will be held in Punjab province’s capital city Lahore on March 5, Chief Minister Punjab Shehbaz Sharif announced on Monday after a high-level meeting. 
Punjab Law Minister Rana Sanaullah also told ARY News that the meeting, after hours of deliberation, the meeting decided to hold the PSL final in Lahore. 
The Punjab administration is taking all measures necessary to hold the final in the city and is assuring players about the security arrangements in and outside the Gaddafi Stadium. ‘International security experts are arriving’ 
Speaking exclusively to ARY News, PSL Chairman Najam Sethi revealed that not only players but international security experts from will be there to watch the PSL final and monitor the security situation in Lahore. 
He added that the tickets for viewing the final in Lahore will be available from tomorrow. 
“Pakistan has suffered a lot after being deprived of international cricket for about eight years,” said Sethi. 
More to follow………….
